cast.overview: Raised on tales of a Djinn fairy princess, Azur, a young Frenchman goes to North Africa in search of the sprite, only to discover that his close childhood friend, Asmar, an Arab youth whose mother raised both boys also seeks the genie.
cast.title: Azur & Asmar: The Princes' Quest

details.biography:
Patrick Timsit is a French comedian, writer and film director. He has been nominated for 4 César Awards, three times as an actor and once as a writer. He is most well known for the French comedy Un indien dans la ville.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Patrick Timsit, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia
details.name: Patrick Timsit
